import { TrayFull } from '../../../Components/Molecules';

# TrayFull

`import { TrayFull } from "@elevenia/master-ui/Components/Molecules";`

TrayFull is a container for fullscreen tray in mobile.
Consists of [Header](/?path=/docs/mobile-organisms-header--search-2-icon-right), Content, and [Footer](/?path=/docs/mobile-organisms-footer--one-button).<br/>
TrayFull needs [Button](/?path=/docs/atom-button--basic) or [ButtonLink](/?path=/docs/atom-buttonlink--basic) as a trigger.
